General.Name: Titijaya Land Bhd
General.Description: Titijaya Land Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development activities in Malaysia. It operates through two segments, Property Development, and Investment Holding and Others. The company develops housing and commercial units. It also offers property investment, management, and money lending services, as well as engages in trading of medicare equipment and products. The company was formerly known as Meridian Flagship Berhad and changed its name to Titijaya Land Berhad in August 2012. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia. Titijaya Land Berhad is a subsidiary of Titijaya Group Sdn. Bhd.
